birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝直隶省顺天府霸州
birth_place.en: Bazhou, Shuntian Prefecture, Zhili, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国湖北省武昌市

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，冯玉祥手下的十三太保之一。曾任山东省政府主席，在1938年中国抗日战争期间因违令撤退而被军事委员会委员长蒋中正处决。
description.en: A Chinese military general of the Republic of China, one of the 'Thirteen Protectors' under Feng Yuxiang. He served as the chairman of the Shandong provincial government and was executed in 1938 by order of Chiang Kai-shek for retreating against orders during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，西北军领袖，韩复矩的早期上司。
description.en: A military leader of the Republic of China, leader of the Guominjun (Northwest Army), and Han Fuju's early commander.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治领导人，国民政府军事委员会委员长。韩复矩后期投靠他，但最终下令将其处决。
description.en: A military and political leader of the Republic of China, Chairman of the Military Affairs Commission of the Nationalist Government. Han Fuju later defected to him, but Chiang eventually ordered his execution.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩的父亲，清末秀才。
description.en: Father of Han Fuju, a Xiucai (scholar who passed the county-level imperial examination) in the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩的长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩的次子。
description.en: Second son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩的三子。
description.en: Third son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩的四子。
description.en: Fourth son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩的过继女儿。
description.en: Adopted daughter of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，晋系军阀首领。韩复矩曾短暂投靠他，后在中原大战中成为其敌人。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, leader of the Shanxi clique of warlords. Han Fuju briefly served under him before becoming his enemy in the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾与韩复矩一同在国民军作战，并一同投靠阎锡山。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who fought alongside Han Fuju in the Guominjun and defected to Yan Xishan with him.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，山东军阀。被韩复矩暗杀。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and a Shandong warlord. He was assassinated by Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，国民革命军第十七军军长，被韩复矩驱逐出山东。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, commander of the 17th Army of the National Revolutionary Army, who was expelled from Shandong by Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 中国思想家、社会活动家。应韩复矩邀请在山东开展乡村建设运动。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher and social activist. He was invited by Han Fuju to carry out the Rural Reconstruction Movement in Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，西安事变发动者之一，韩复矩在事变后曾发电报支持他。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident. Han Fuju sent a telegram to support him after the incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，西安事变发动者之一，韩复矩在事变后曾发电报支持他。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident. Han Fuju sent a telegram to support him after the incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，第五战区司令长官。韩复矩曾是其副手但违抗其命令。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, commander of the 5th War Area. Han Fuju served as his deputy but disobeyed his orders.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，四川省政府主席。曾与韩复矩密谋反蒋。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, chairman of the Sichuan provincial government. He conspired with Han Fuju against Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，西北军将领，韩复矩的老友。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, a general of the Northwest Army, and an old friend of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，蒋中正的嫡系，曾奉命护送韩复矩家属。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, a loyal subordinate of Chiang Kai-shek, who was ordered to escort Han Fuju's family.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，接替韩复矩担任河南省政府主席。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who succeeded Han Fuju as the chairman of the Henan provincial government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，韩复矩的前任山东省政府主席。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, Han Fuju's predecessor as the chairman of the Shandong provincial government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，接替韩复矩担任山东省政府主席。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who succeeded Han Fuju as the chairman of the Shandong provincial government.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者、教育家，韩复矩岳父。
description.en: Chinese scholar and educator, father-in-law of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 清末新军的军事单位，韩复矩于1910年在此参军。
description.en: A military unit of the New Army in the late Qing dynasty, which Han Fuju joined in 1910.

description.zh-cn: 对冯玉祥麾下十三位高级将领的合称，韩复矩是其中之一。
description.en: A collective name for the thirteen most prominent generals under Feng Yuxiang, of which Han Fuju was one.

description.zh-cn: 1924年北京政变后由冯玉祥成立的军事力量，韩复矩曾在其中担任师长等职。
description.en: A military force established by Feng Yuxiang after the 1924 Beijing Coup, in which Han Fuju served as a division commander.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第二集团军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第二集团军
en: 2nd Group Army of the National Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 北伐期间由国民联军改编而成的部队，由冯玉祥领导，韩复矩曾任军长。
description.en: A force reorganized from the Guominlianjun during the Northern Expedition, led by Feng Yuxiang, where Han Fuju served as an army commander.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期河南省的行政机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Henan Province during the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期山东省的行政机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Shandong Province during the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间的军事编制，韩复矩曾任总司令。
description.en: A military formation during the Second Sino-Japanese War, of which Han Fuju was the commander-in-chief.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间的战区之一，韩复矩曾任副司令长官。
description.en: One of the war zones during the Second Sino-Japanese War, where Han Fuju served as the deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 清末由冯玉祥等人发动的军事起义，韩复矩曾追随参与。
description.en: A military uprising launched by Feng Yuxiang and others in the late Qing dynasty, in which Han Fuju participated.

description.zh-cn: 1924年冯玉祥发动的军事政变，此后国民军成立。
description.en: A military coup launched by Feng Yuxiang in 1924, which led to the formation of the Guominjun.

description.zh-cn: 1936年张学良和杨虎城发动的“兵谏”，扣押了蒋中正。韩复矩事后发电报表示支持张、杨，此举得罪了蒋中正。
description.en: A 'remonstrance by military force' launched by Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng in 1936, in which Chiang Kai-shek was detained. Han Fuju sent a telegram supporting Zhang and Yang, an act that offended Chiang.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军为统一中国而进行的军事行动，韩复矩曾率部参与。
description.en: A military campaign led by the National Revolutionary Army to unify China, in which Han Fuju participated with his troops.

description.zh-cn: 1930年蒋中正与阎锡山、冯玉祥等地方军阀之间的战争。已投靠蒋介石的韩复矩在此战中与晋军作战，立下军功。
description.en: A war in 1930 between Chiang Kai-shek and regional warlords including Yan Xishan and Feng Yuxiang. Han Fuju, having already defected to Chiang, fought against the Shanxi army and achieved military merit.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在通过教育、经济和政治改革来振兴中国农村地区的社会运动。韩复矩在统治山东期间推动了此运动。
description.en: A social movement aimed at revitalizing rural China through educational, economic, and political reforms. Han Fuju promoted this movement during his rule in Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 1937年至1945年间中华民国与大日本帝国之间发生的战争。韩复矩在此战争初期因擅自撤退而被处决。
description.en: A war fought between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan from 1937 to 1945. Han Fuju was executed in the early stages of this war for unauthorized retreat.

description.zh-cn: 位于今河北省，是韩复矩的出生地。
description.en: Located in modern-day Hebei province, it is the birthplace of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖北省，是韩复矩被处决的地点。
description.en: Located in Hubei province, it is the place where Han Fuju was executed.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩是韩世泽的儿子。
description.en: Han Fuju is the son of Han Shize.

description.zh-cn: 韩嗣燮是韩复矩的长子。
description.en: Han Sixie is the eldest son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩嗣烺是韩复矩的次子。
description.en: Han Silang is the second son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩嗣辉是韩复矩的三子。
description.en: Han Sihui is the third son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩嗣煌是韩复矩的四子。
description.en: Han Sihuang is the fourth son of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 韩嗣虑是韩复矩的过继女儿。
description.en: Han Silv is the adopted daughter of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 高艺珍是韩复矩的妻子。
description.en: Gao Yizhen is the wife of Han Fuju.

description.zh-cn: 高艺珍是学者高步瀛的女儿。
description.en: Gao Yizhen is the daughter of the scholar Gao Puying.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩早期是冯玉祥的部下，追随其参加滦州起义，并在其领导的国民军中任职。
description.en: Han Fuju was an early subordinate of Feng Yuxiang, following him in the Luanzhou Uprising and serving in the Guominjun under his command.

description.zh-cn: 1929年5月22日，韩复矩背叛冯玉祥，率部投靠蒋中正的中央政府。
description.en: On May 22, 1929, Han Fuju betrayed Feng Yuxiang and led his troops to defect to Chiang Kai-shek's central government.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩是冯玉祥十三太保之一。
description.en: Han Fuju was one of Feng Yuxiang's Thirteen Protectors.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩于1929年5月22日背叛冯玉祥，转而投靠蒋中正。
description.en: Han Fuju betrayed Feng Yuxiang and defected to Chiang Kai-shek on May 22, 1929.

description.zh-cn: 1938年1月，蒋中正下令以违抗命令、擅自撤退的罪名将韩复矩处决。
description.en: In January 1938, Chiang Kai-shek ordered the execution of Han Fuju on charges of disobeying orders and unauthorized retreat.

description.zh-cn: 1926年8月，韩复矩在南口大战后曾短暂投靠阎锡山。
description.en: In August 1926, after the Battle of Nankou, Han Fuju briefly defected to Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战期间，已投靠蒋介石的韩复矩率部与阎锡山的晋军作战。
description.en: During the Central Plains War, Han Fuju, having defected to Chiang Kai-shek, led his troops to fight against Yan Xishan's Shanxi army.

position.en: Deputy Commander of the 5th War Area

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，韩复矩出任第五战区副司令长官，司令长官是李宗仁。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Han Fuju was appointed Deputy Commander of the 5th War Area, under Commander Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩违抗时任第五战区司令长官李宗仁命其死守泰安的命令。
description.en: Han Fuju disobeyed the order from Li Zongren, commander of the 5th War Area, to defend Tai'an to the death.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩曾与四川省主席刘湘秘密联络，企图共同发动反蒋运动。
description.en: Han Fuju secretly contacted Liu Xiang, the chairman of Sichuan Province, in an attempt to jointly launch an anti-Chiang Kai-shek movement.

description.zh-cn: 孙连仲是韩复矩的西北军老友，在韩复矩被处决后的公祭上，唯有孙连仲亲往致祭。
description.en: Sun Lianzhong was an old friend of Han Fuju from the Northwest Army. After Han's execution, only Sun attended his public memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩于1930年9月至1938年1月担任山东省政府主席，成为山东省的实际统治者。
description.en: Han Fuju served as the Chairman of the Shandong Provincial Government from September 1930 to January 1938, becoming the de facto ruler of Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩于1928年12月至1930年10月担任河南省政府主席。
description.en: Han Fuju served as the Chairman of the Henan Provincial Government from December 1928 to October 1930.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩在统治山东期间，暗杀了原山东军阀张宗昌。
description.en: During his rule in Shandong, Han Fuju assassinated the former Shandong warlord Zhang Zongchang.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩在巩固其在山东的统治时，驱逐了国民革命军第十七军军长刘珍年。
description.en: While consolidating his rule in Shandong, Han Fuju expelled Liu Zhennian, commander of the 17th Army of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩在治理山东期间，聘请梁漱溟开展大规模的乡村建设运动。
description.en: During his governance of Shandong, Han Fuju hired Liang Shuming to carry out a large-scale Rural Reconstruction Movement.

description.zh-cn: 韩复矩在抗日战争初期，为保存实力而违令撤退，放弃了济南和泰安等地。
description.en: In the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Han Fuju disobeyed orders and retreated to preserve his forces, abandoning Jinan and Tai'an.

description.zh-cn: 西安事变发生后，韩复矩发电报支持张学良和杨虎城，此举被认为是其后来被蒋中正处决的原因之一。
description.en: After the Xi'an Incident, Han Fuju sent a telegram supporting Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng, an act considered one of the reasons for his later execution by Chiang Kai-shek.
